thread.title: CEOs of 2050

author: Reuters Editorial
title: CEOs of 2050
text:
deloitte-main sponsored by deloitte
CEOs of 2050 SPONSORED BY DELOITTE
In 30 years, what will successful companies look like and who will lead them? Look ahead and time travel with us to 2050 to find out. The Smart Grid that Blockchain Built
Learn more about Blockchain
In the wake of multiple superstorms, this Brooklyn entrepreneur created a blockchain-based, sustainable smart grid for her neighborhood that spread to cities and towns across the world. Sponsored by Deloitte Sponsored by Deloitte An urban revolution How can cities, businesses, and citizens kick-start their smart city journeys?
